attributes.action: Make people go out to work rather than claim benefits
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I was sicken when i saw a news paper of a couple who have five children and leave off our taxes. I work in a prison and my partner works in telecomms, between us we bring in £39,000 a year. We don't claim any benefits. We have 3 children between us two of whom we pay csa to. The couple mentioned in the paper, their benefits come to more than our salary.She was quoted saying why should i work full time and bring home less money! We have to work so much over time just so that we make ends meat. They should have a time limit on how long you can stay on benefits or stop there money if they don't try to get jobs. They are just bone idel.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
